SUITE.NAME: train_copy with previous model Coverage Results

task.summary: update and bug-fix of data/print/evaluation -data data/kp20k-test/kp20k -vocab data/kp20k-test/kp20k.vocab.pt -exp_path "exp/%s.%s" -exp "kp20k-copy" -bidirectional -save_model_every 1 -run_valid_every 1 -report_every 1 -scheduled_sampling -scheduled_sampling_batches 10 -copy_model

Correct the sampling of next word in copy model: if pick up a unknown word, replace it with unk. Donâ€™t merge their probs to unk Remove the limitation of max_unk_word, dynamically determine the size of extension (depends on the max number of oov words in current batch) Remove the k in model.generate(), just return probs of all words, let generator decide how many words to keep

fix the bug in copy model: if a sentence without oov mixed with sentences having oovs in the same batch, it would have probs on non-existent oov words. It's because I initialize the extended part of logits to zeros in order to plus the copying logits, however many logits are negative and then they become big probabilities after softmax. Fix it by initializing extended part of logits with -inf if the sentence don't have that oov.
slightly modify the output, set apart the predicting output from exp log
add and run input-feeding and copy-input-feeding
